message: Starting validation system design. Reading update_agent_progress function and findings.
Read update_agent_progress function (lines 550-619). Now analyzing coordination findings from investigator agents to understand validation gaps.

Analyzed findings. Key issue: update_agent_progress accepts status='completed' with ZERO validation. No file checks, no test verification, no evidence requirements. Designing multi-layer validation system now.

Designing multi-layer validation system: 1) Workspace evidence checks, 2) Agent type-specific validation, 3) Progressive validation (warnings vs blocking), 4) Self-reporting validation metadata in message field. Preparing comprehensive design document.

Validation system design complete. Delivered comprehensive multi-layer validation architecture with 4 validation layers: 1) Workspace evidence checks (files modified, findings reported), 2) Type-specific validation (investigator needs findings, builder needs tests, fixer needs verification), 3) Self-reporting message validation (evidence keywords, minimum length, no TODOs), 4) Progress pattern validation (detect fake progress jumps). Implementation plan includes exact function signatures, integration points (lines 549, 600-603), code examples for each check, progressive enforcement strategy (warnings → blocking), and prompt section to communicate validation to agents. Design addresses root cause: agents currently trusted blindly without verification. Solution: Trust but verify - agents must PROVE completion with evidence, not just claim it. All findings documented with pseudocode, enforcement phases, false positive mitigation, and monitoring strategy.
